content: the pattern is available for free on my blog > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 1 ** **about the pattern** this cute crochet hanging basket is made by working the mesh stitch from corner to corner then we sew the square to create a lovely hanging basket **skill level** - easy **crochet terminology** - the pattern is written using english u s terminology **materials needed** - hooks size needed 5 5 mm / i - the project is crocheted with worsted #4 weight cotton yarn i used knit picks - dishie ** the basket is worked with 2 strands held together you can also use 1 strand of chunky weight yarn total amount of yarn needed 180gr/313m/342yds - 2 stitch markers optional - tapestry needle **finished size** - 12 5×8 5 in 32×22 cm ** you can choose to make the pattern as a rectangle or a square and work it as big as you d like if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact me copyright © 2025 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the pattern and photos in this design are property of gootie you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern please note that there is only a certain amount of variations possible when one crochets and any similarities to other patterns are purely coincidental to the best of my knowledge this pattern is my original unique design this pdf pattern is free from viruses and safe to use it includes links to reputable websites however users should exercise caution when accessing external links from unknown sources gpsr representative ciara doyle c15 y5f9 ireland ciara@thefairythorn ie 1 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up
